sources.title: 1945 - Lady on a Train - La dama el tren - Charles David - VOSE
sources.description: For Academic / Educational Use Only derechonoir.wordpress.com

metadata.Plot: While in a train halted at a station, Nikki Collins witnesses a murder committed in a nearby building. When she goes to the police they think she's read one too many mystery novels. She then enlists a popular mystery writer to help with her sleuthing.
metadata.Writer: Edmund Beloin, Robert O'Brien, Leslie Charteris
metadata.Actors: Deanna Durbin, Ralph Bellamy, David Bruce
